modName: Purity --- Pure Waters - Drink Eat Sleep Bathe Patch
summary: Makes it so that users of the Drink Eat Sleep Bathe mod by TheRealRyanB can refill their bottles and bathe while using Laast's Purity or Pure Waters mods. There's also a reasonable chance that it will work for other survival/realistic needs mods as long as you follow the load order.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=2]
[b]NOTE:[/b] This patch is for [i]Purity [/i]or[i] Pure Waters[/i]. If you are looking for patches for [i]WATER - Water and Terrain Enhancement Redux[/i] or the [i]Ruffled Feather WATER[/i], they are here:[/size][b]

[/b][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63627]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63627[/url][/size][b]

Overview:[/b]
[/size]
This patch makes it so that users of the Drink Eat Sleep Bathe mod by TheRealRyanB can refill their bottles and bathe while using Laast's Purity or Pure Waters mods. There's also a reasonable chance that it will work for other survival/realistic needs mods as long as you follow the load order.

It only modifies Purity.esp's and Purewaters.esp's water types to be usable by DrinkEatSleepBathe.esp's refill script by editing a certain setting. This patch does *not* change anything in the DrinkEatSleepBathe.esp itself.

[b]
[size=3]Required files:[/size][/b]

Drink Eat Sleep Bathe mod (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29025/?) of your choice
Purity 2.0  **or** the standalone Pure Waters Vanilla 5.0   **or**   Pure Waters Legendary 5.0


[b][size=3]Function & Compatibility:[/size][/b]

This mod sets each Water Type in Purity/Purewaters.esps to "Causes Damage" while keeping the Damage count to 0, which is how DrinkEatSleepBathe.esp tells its refill script that the player is standing in water. Therefore, placing any other mod that edits a given Water Type after the patch will likely override that setting, once again preventing the player from refilling empty bottles in that kind of water.


[b][size=3]Which File to Use:[/size][/b]

If you're using Purity 2.0, use the Purity patch.
If you're using the standalone Pure Waters Vanilla 5.0, use the Vanilla patch.
If you're using the standalone Pure Waters Legendary 5.0 for Dragonborn and Dawnguard DLCs, use the Legendary patch.
Use only one file.


[b][size=3]Installation & Load Order:[/size][/b]

Unzip the archive and drop the patch esp into your Data folder. Place Purity.esp/Purewaters.esp somewhere below DrinkEatSleepBathe.esp so you get the full benefits of the water settings. The author (Laast) recommends you place it at the bottom of your load order anyway. Then put the patch esp immediately after the main file.


[b][size=3]Load Order Example:[/size][/b]

[size=2]For [/size][size=3][size=2]users of the newer Purity overhaul:[/size]

[size=2]Somestuff.esp
[u]DrinkEatSleepBathe.esp[/u]
Otherstuff.esp
Morestuff.esp
[u]Purity.esp
Purity_DrinkEatSleepBathe_Patch.esp
[/u][/size][/size]

For users of the older, standalone Pure Waters file:

Somestuff.esp
[u]DrinkEatSleepBathe.esp[/u]
Otherstuff.esp
Morestuff.esp
[u]Purity.esp
Purity_DrinkEatSleepBathe_Patch.esp[/u]
[size=3]

[b]Support:[/b][/size]

If I've missed a water type, please let me know.
[size=3]

[b]Credits:[/b][/size]

Purity and Pure Waters were created by the amazing Laast.
Drink Eat Sleep Bathe was created by the equally amazing TheRealRyanB.


If you like their mods, be sure to endorse them!
author: randperry with permission from Laast and TheRealRyanB
